mapper.select: SELECT sys_dic_id AS sysDicId, type_code AS typeCode, type_name AS typeName, dic_value AS dicValue, dic_name AS dicName, dic_memo AS dicMemo FROM tsa_sys_dictionary WHERE deleted = 0 and (type_code like '%${qo.typeCodeOrDicName}%' or type_name like '%${qo.typeCodeOrDicName}%')
mapper.delete: UODATE tsa_sys_dictionary SET deleted = 1, updated_time = NOW() WHERE sys_dic_id in(#{ids})
mapper.select: SELECT type_code AS typeCode, type_name AS typeName, dic_value AS dicValue, dic_name AS dicName FROM tsa_sys_dictionary WHERE type_code = #{typeCode} AND deleted = 0
